attributes.action: Riot police to be given more power in extreme situations.
attributes.additional_details: Riot police should be given more rights against all mobs and protests when they get out of hand. Riot police should be allowed to use greater force and possibly even to shoot people who are getting too out of control. Please sign this petition to show your support for our hard working police force who deserve to be allowed to use equal force in retaliation to the anarchists who shame our beautiful country.
